channel.title: tile-server on Jiang Jun Jie's Site
channel.description: Recent content in tile-server on Jiang Jun Jie's Site

item.title: Docker OSM
item.description: version: '3.2' services: osm: image: overv/openstreetmap-tile-server:latest container_name: osm volumes: - openstreetmap-data:/var/lib/postgresql/12/main # environment: # - ALLOW_CORS=enabled ports: - 28080:80 restart: always command: "run" networks: - proxy volumes: openstreetmap-data: external: true networks: proxy: external: true
